Test Name: ThinPrep Screen with Human Papillomavirus (HPV) Reflex
Specimen Type: Cervical specimen (exfoliated cells in PreservCyt solution)
Purpose: To provide a standardized protocol for analyzing ThinPrep Pap tests with reflex HPV testing to deliver accurate, reliable results for clinical decision-making.
Equipment: ThinPrep 2000 Processor, microscope, HPV assay platform (e.g., PCR or Hybrid Capture 2)
